title: HOUR 3- Chris Simms Oct 06, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Chris Simms Oct 06, 2020
description:
Chris Simms tells Dan that with Deshaun Watson at QB for the Houston Texans; it makes that job an attractive head coaching opportunity. Chris says that the Texans will definitely be looking for an offensive minded head coaches.
